ARABIC: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْقَصَصُ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is the true account: there is no other god besides Allah. Allah - He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And this verily is the true account. There is no god but God, and God is all-mighty and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is the true story. There is no God but Allah, and assuredly Allah is All-Mighty, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the true story (of Jesus). There is no Lord but God. It is God who is Majestic and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This undoubtedly is the true narrative; there is none worthy of worship except Allah; and Allah is the Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this is the true narrative, and there is no god except Allah. And indeed, Allah is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely this is the true explanation, and there is no god but Allah; and most surely Allah-- He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is the true story. There is no god but God, and assuredly God is the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! This verily is the true narrative. There is no Allah save Allah, and lo! Allah, He verily is, is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is the true account. There is no deity save Him. God is Mighty and Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this! it is the true recital; and God there is none save Allah, and verily Allah! He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is indeed the true account, for sure. There is no god but Allah, and indeed Allah is the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is the true account: There is no god except Allah; and Allah-He is indeed the Exalted in Power, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! This is the true narrative [about the story of 'Iesa (Jesus)], and, La ilaha ill-Allah (none has the right to be worshipped but Allah, the One and the Only True God, Who has neither a wife nor a son). And indeed, Allah is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is indeed the truthful narration. There is no god except Allah. It is Allah who is the Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is the narrative of truth: there is no god but God. God is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, this is the true narration. And there is no deity except Allah. And indeed, Allah is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:62] This, mentioned above, is the true story, the report free of any doubt. There is no god but God, and assuredly God is Mighty, in His Kingdom, Wise, in His actions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 60 (Lo! This) which We have mentioned, Muhammad, regarding Jesus and the delegation of Najran (verily is the true narrative) the true fact that Jesus was not Allah, His son or His partner. (There is no God save Allah) without a son or partner, (and lo! Allah is the Mighty) Who is vengeful against those who do not believe in Him, (the Wise) Who has commanded that none should be worshipped except Him; it is also said (the Wise) means: Allah ruled that they should go out and invoke His curse on those who lie, but the delegation of Najran refused to do so because they knew they were liars and that Muhammad was a true Prophet and emissary whose traits and description were to be found in their own Scripture.
